item.title: Dangerous parking, 13th November
item.description:
The end corners of Lyefield Rd East where it meets School Rd. These 2 corners need double yellow lines to prevent parking. This is even more important now due to the massive increase in diverted traffic. A nursery and infants school open out on to, or next to this corner and with parked cars crossing is both difficult and dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Lyefield Road East, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 13th November
item.description:
Outside of the Old Police House. Heading north on A38 it's the last drain grid before the traffic lights. Tues 11th AM, water flooding all of lane 1 and partially lane 2.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole footpath needs clearing and resurfacing, 13th November
item.description:
The entire stretch of footpath requires work. It is so uneven and when covered in slippery leaves is a disaster waiting to happen. The bushes need cutting back, the pathway needs resurfacing and the leaves need clearing regularly at this time of year. Some dog poo bins wouldn't go a miss either as it's constantly littered in dog mess.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Denbigh Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
